<h3 id="X10950">X(10950)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-JOHNSON AND 2ND JOHNSON-YFF</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c-a)*(2*a^3-(b-c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :
<br>
<b>X(10950) = (R+2*r)*X(1)-2*r*X(5)</b>
<p>X(10950) lies on these lines:{1,5}, {3,10573}, {4,1389}, {7,9657}, {8,21}, {10,2646}, {33,1904}, {35,5690}, {41,1146}, {52,517}, {56,944}, {57,9845}, {60,6740}, {65,515}, {72,519}, {100,8256}, {145,497}, {150,3665}, {210,5795}, {224,3925}, {243,5174}, {354,6738}, {388,6839}, {390,3621}, {398,7052}, {404,6224}, {484,550}, {498,5790}, {499,10246}, {528,10394}, {529,3868}, {535,4084}, {549,5445}, {594,2268}, {632,5444}, {938,3304}, {942,5434}, {1056,6900}, {1058,6965}, {1069,9933}, {1145,8715}, {1155,4297}, {1159,9655}, {1210,1319}, {1329,4511}, {1376,5554}, {1385,1737}, {1388,3086}, {1466,5768}, {1468,5348}, {1478,3649}, {1479,1482}, {1697,3632}, {1698,5326}, {1749,5441}, {1788,5204}, {1836,3340}, {1857,2334}, {1859,1891}, {2082,4534}, {2361,5247}, {2478,5289}, {2885,9458}, {2886,5086}, {3056,5846}, {3085,6852}, {3244,5048}, {3245,4324}, {3295,7489}, {3303,3488}, {3419,10393}, {3467,5559}, {3485,7548}, {3586,5812}, {3600,4860}, {3601,3679}, {3616,7504}, {3617,5218}, {3622,10585}, {3623,5274}, {3625,4314}, {3633,7962}, {3655,5298}, {3683,5837}, {3689,6736}, {3813,4861}, {3869,5855}, {3885,5854}, {3893,5853}, {3897,4999}, {4293,5221}, {4305,5217}, {4317,5708}, {4642,7004}, {4678,5281}, {4853,4863}, {4855,6174}, {5250,7082}, {5270,5425}, {5603,10894}, {5604,10922}, {5605,10921}, {5697,5844}, {5714,9656}, {5734,9671}, {5836,10391}, {5885,6797}, {7319,9779}, {8148,9668}, {8163,9797}, {8192,10830}, {9613,10404}, {9616,9662}, {9669,10247}, {9997,10872}, {10522,10912}, {10591,10595}, {10795,10798}</p>
<p>
X(10950) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3057,950), (6284,10572), (6737,5795), (7354,65), (10106,6738), (10944,1)<br>
X(10950) = inverse-in-Feuerbach-hyperbola of X(5)<br>
X(10950) = X(8)-of-Mandart-incircle-triangle<br>
X(10950) = homothetic center of outer Johnson and Caelum triangles<br>
X(10950) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,80,5), (1,355,12), (1,1837,11), (1,5727,1837), (1,5881,5252), (1,7741,5901), (1,10073,10948), (1,10826,5886), (8,3486,55), (10,2646,5432), (55,3486,10543), (145,497,2098), (496,1483,1), (497,3436,10953), (938,3476,3304), (950,3057,3058), (958,3913,1259), (1210,5882,1319), (1385,1737,5433), (1788,5731,5204), (3086,7967,1388), (3340,5691,1836), (4297,4848,1155), (4305,5657,5217), (5270,5425,6147), (5795,6737,210), (5886,10826,7173), (6738,10106,354), (10958,10959,11)
